'''Radiant Spincrystal 52''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Kitsune's Mask]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of a rock next to a [[Tanuki]] statue in [[Chinju Forest]].
